mapper.insert: insert into ecs_affiliate_log (log_id, order_id, time, user_id, user_name, money, point, separate_type) values (#{log_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{separate_type,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.select: select log_id, order_id, time, user_id, user_name, money, point, separate_type from ecs_affiliate_log
